workflow.name: Gumroad Clientbell: Auto-Log Sales, Ping Telegram, & Thank via Email
workflow.description:
## Who is this for?  
This template is perfect for **Gumroad creators, solopreneurs, digital product sellers**, and **freelancers** who want to **track and thank customers automatically** ‚Äî without spending time on manual work.

---

## What problem does this solve?  
Every sale is a moment to build trust. But manually checking your inbox for new orders, logging clients, and remembering to send a thank-you note? It‚Äôs time-consuming and inconsistent.

**This workflow handles it all:**  
From sale ‚Üí to sheet ‚Üí to ping ‚Üí to personalized ‚Äúthank you‚Äù ‚Äî all fully automated.

---

## What this workflow does:  
‚úÖ Triggers on each new sale on **Gumroad**  
üìã Extracts buyer details, amount paid, and product purchased  
üìà Logs the sale to a **Google Sheet** for tracking  
üì≤ Sends a **Telegram approval message** to notify you  
üíå (Optional) Sends a Gmail **thank-you email** to the buyer  
üîÅ Keeps your workflow organized with color-coded notes and sample data

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions:

1. Create **Gumroad API** and connect the trigger node  
2. Authenticate with **Google Sheets** to store each client  
3. Connect your **Telegram bot** for real-time alerts  
4. (Optional) Setup **Gmail API** for sending thank-you emails  
5. Customize the email copy & sheet headers (e.g. % cut, timestamps)

---

## üóí Color-coded workflow notes:

To make customization smooth, the workflow includes a **color-coded sticky note system**:

üü© **Green Notes** ‚Äì Main building blocks (trigger, logging, ping, email)  
üü¶ **Blue Notes** ‚Äì Setup guidance and editable fields (e.g. your email or brand name)  
üü® **Yellow Notes** ‚Äì Optional upgrades (e.g. swap Gmail, use AI email generator, change to WhatsApp)

Each step has comments or hints to make your setup easy ‚Äî whether you're new to n8n or a seasoned automator.

---

## üîß How to customize this workflow?

üéØ Swap Gmail with Outlook, SMTP, or Mailgun  
ü§ñ Use AI (e.g. OpenAI or Claude) to draft personalized emails dynamically  
üìû Replace Telegram with WhatsApp, Discord, or Slack  
üóÉÔ∏è Log to Airtable or Notion instead of Google Sheets  
üß† Add approval logic or advanced tagging in Gmail

---

## üßæ Licensing & Support

This template is built by **Velebit from Innovatio**. External links (Gumroad store or support email) are included in the notes for optional help and upgrades.

A separate license applies to the paid version on Gumroad, which includes additional modules and commercial use rights.

üì© Support & customization: **velebit@innovatio.design**

user.name: Velebit from Innovatio
user.bio:
I design modular (no-code, low-code, AI) automation workflows for creators, marketers, and lean SaaS teams.  
Founder of [Innovatio](https://innovatio.design) ‚Äî empowering humans with AI-powered systems that save time, boost revenue, and scale with heart.

üöÄ Want custom automation? Let's talk ‚Üí velebit@innovatio.design

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
